name: Square shape
description:
Triangle, Circle and Square live quietly in their multicoloured maze. One day, however, Circle gets lost in the maze. Triangle is desperate### and sends Square to look for him###\ERROR#???# blah blah blah...

This might seem like another one of those corny games with a stupid maze to go through, but what if there's more to it than that?

What if we npcs know you're playing?
